original_text: But other people who think that God's kingdom belongs to them will not be there. God's angels will throw them into the dark places that are far away from God. There those people will weep very much. They will bite their teeth together.’
korean_text: 그 나라의 본 자손들은 바깥 어두운 데 쫓겨나 거기서 울며 이를 갈게 되리라

sentences.original_text: who think that God's kingdom belongs to them
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 나라가 자기 것이라고 생각하는 사람들은

sentences.original_text: that are far away from God
There those people will weep very much
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 그 사람들은 많이 울 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will bite their teeth together
